turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I need 2 pizzas from Fultano's pizza for my niece's birthday party.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely! Which Fultano's?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in Astoria, OR. They have the best pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. What kind of pizza do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Large Bobby Special and an Everything Pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Um, I don't see a Bobby Special on the menu. Do you mean a Robbie Special?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ugh, Yes, a Robbie Special. You would think I would remember that since I worked with the guy that the pizza is named.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It happens to us all. So, a large Robbie Special and a Large Everything Pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want me to remove the onions from the Everything pizza? I know you don't like onions.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I appreciate that you remembered that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Do you want any bread sticks or ranch dressings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just the two pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Is this for pickup or for delivery?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will go get them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: For pickup - got it. It looks like we have a total of $42.00. Should I charge it to your account?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I placed the order and sent a copy of your receipt to your phone. Anything else that I can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'm good. Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome.
